name: cap-reana-cookiecutter-template
description: A cookiecutter to create a cap-reana template for reproducible research.

variables.name: project_name
variables.description: Please enter a name for the project name

variables.name: file_name
variables.description: Please enter a name for your reana configuration file

variables.name: is_cadi
variables.prompt: Does your analysis has a CADI ID (y/n)?
variables.description: Please indicate whether this analysis has an assigned CADI ID.

variables.name: cadi_id
variables.description: Please enter a valid CADI ID.

variables.name: author_name
variables.prompt: Who is the main author of the code?
variables.description: Please enter the name of the main code author. This will be the contact person of the analysis.

variables.name: repo_name
variables.description: Please enter the URL of the github/gitlab repository.

variables.name: year
variables.prompt: Enter the year of the analysis

variables.name: short_description
variables.prompt: Please enter a short description of the analysis

variables.name: input_param
variables.prompt: Enter the full path to your input parameters
variables.description: Full path within your repository to your input parameters file (.yml)

variables.name: input_folders
variables.prompt: Enter the folders you need as input for your analysis
variables.description: Folder containing information required for running your analysis workflow

variables.name: output_files
variables.prompt: Enter the file name of the analysis output
variables.description: File name of the analysis output

variables.name: workflow_type
variables.description: Type of workflow to be used by REANA

variables.name: the_workflow
variables.prompt: Enter the full path to your workflow file
variables.description: Full path within your repository to your workflow
